thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com
thread.title: Karen

author: Karen
title: Karen
text: I have so enjoyed the items i have purchased, just amazing how much savings i have gotten, my friends are amazed at how much i have saved, it's unbelievable, I'm going to keep on shopping and to everyone out there, please give this website a chance before you buy elsewhere, very contented shopper, oh and the time of shipping, awesome , thanks Groupon for helping this old lady save my money ðŸ¤—
